1370: Marcibilia was born in Walker straet in 1370.
Got married to Bartrarde at age 16 in 1370.
Gave birth to Tetta in 1370 at age 16.
1371: Gave birth to Richolfus in 1371 at age 17.
1375: Gave birth to Soeten in 1375 at age 21.
Lost daughter Soeten when Soeten was 1 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Marisseis in 1378 at age 24.
1379: Gave birth to Jurre in 1379 at age 25.
1380: Gave birth to Lutbrandus in 1380 at age 26.
1382: Gave birth to Willem in 1382 at age 28.
Lost son Willem when Willem was 1 years old.
1383: Gave birth to Valken in 1383 at age 29.
1384: Gave birth to Suaneka in 1384 at age 30.
1390: Gave birth to Ryccie in 1390 at age 36.
1391: Lost daughter Tetta when Tetta was 22 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1392: Lost daughter Ryccie when Ryccie was 3 years old.
